name: Super Pipe Hell
description:
Vertical Platformer X Bullet Hell - Escape pipe hell with the help of your gun-hat.

Keyboard Controls

  • Move - WASD, Arrowkeys
  • Jump / shoot - Space, Z
  • Smart bomb - Shift, X

Gamepad Controls

  • Move - D-pad, joystick
  • Jump / shoot - A
  • Smart bomb - X

Information

  • Combo - collect 10 coins within 10 seconds to gain a multiplier.
  • Smart bomb - Gain 3 smart bombs when you lose a life. +1 smart bomb from picking up Pixie-Hats, +1 smart bomb from completing a stage. 
  • Alert mode - The first time you get hit, the player flashes red for 3 seconds. If another hit is taken within that time a life is lost.

Music - Kodamooya CCBY Gnagno
